message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to acquire [Product Name] for a price that I believe will be mutually beneficial. While I value this product at no less than $1,000,000, I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,150,000. This price is competitive and represents a significant value for you given your own assessment of the product's worth. I'm confident that this product will be a valuable asset to you.  Let me know your thoughts.
